argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mscl.x | |- X = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | mscl.d | |- D = ( dist ` M ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ovres | |- ( ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) B ) = ( A D B ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( M e. MetSp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) B ) = ( A D B ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_msmet2 | |- ( M e. MetSp -> ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) e. ( Met ` X ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_metcl | |- ( ( ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) e. ( Met ` X ) /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) B ) e. RR ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( M e. MetSp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A ( D |` ( X X. X ) ) B ) e. RR ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( M e. MetSp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) e. RR ) |
